Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to a track switching problem near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to a track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Harlem-bound Green Line trains will be rerouted to the inner Loop (Pink Line Side).

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to track switching problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to track switching problem. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Belmont and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
